price: 52. Kaši kotosa bapengwi te, mpe bundisa bango (na kurani), kobundisa ya bonene.
arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wajāhid'hum bihi jihādan kabīran
